question: The name of the recent cyclone Bulbul was contributed by which country?
explanation: Bulbul is the seventh named storm of the unusually active 2019 North Indian Ocean cyclone season. The season has seen Cyclone Pabuk (South China Sea-Andaman Sea), Cyclone Fani (Bay of Bengal), Cyclone Vayu (Arabian Sea), Cyclone Hikka (Arabian Sea), Cyclone Kyarr (Arabian Sea) and Cyclone Maha (Arabian Sea).Bulbul name was contributed by Pakistan. If IMDâ€™s predictions hold true, Bulbul will also be the sixth storm to reach an intensity of very severe cyclonic storm.
